collections.title: Add a new inbox
collections.content: Warmbox is a plug&play SaaS that automates the email warm-up process to get cold emails delivered. How does it work? ğŸ“§ We send emails from your inbox ğŸ’Œ Your emails automatically get removed from spam, opened, marked as favorite, and replied ğŸ”¥ Your inbox gets warm, and your deliverability increases ğŸ“­ Your cold emails don't land in spam anymore, and you reach your targets Through a collaborative tool, Warmbox helps teams to generate more value with cold emailing. Say farewell to spam and get up to +30% open rate. Improve your email deliverability and generate more value with cold emailing.
